snippet: With his new project, Eternal Lips, the veteran artist Grey Gersten surrenders to the joys of pop music, as seen in the video for “Voice,” which stars a diminutive Michael Jackson impersonator and premieres here.
abstract: With his new project, Eternal Lips, the veteran artist Grey Gersten surrenders to the joys of pop music, as seen in the video for “Voice,” which stars a diminutive Michael Jackson impersonator and premieres here.

headline.main: Listen Up | A Brooklyn Experimental Musician Gets in Touch With His Inner Michael Jackson
